messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] to Marti in MD unschooling/homeschooling contacts
messages.msgSnippet: I d be interested in this too.  We re in Pa. Kristen ... From: One of the Wechts To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com Sent: Monday, February 16, 2004
messages.messageBody:
I'd be interested in this too. We're in Pa.

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: One of the Wechts
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, February 16, 2004 12:54 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] to Marti in MD unschooling/homeschooling contacts


Do you know about Rubarb Jam ( regular homeschoolers get together ) in Frederick MD and Yahoo group Maryland UFC (unschooling family connection) ? Some how I got the idea that you were new to the area.
Email me off list if needed.
Beth in MD

Scott - Wecht @ erols . com ( get rid of the spaces )
